Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Troponin I ES Reagent Pack
VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Troponin I ES Calibrators
VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Troponin I ES Range Verifiers
Regulation Name(s): Quality control material, assayed and unassayed
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Immunodiagnostic Products Troponin I ES assay, calibrators, and range verifiers for cardiac Troponin I measurement in serum and plasma.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of cardiac Troponin I in human serum and plasma (heparin and EDTA) to aid assessment of myocardial damage and risk stratification, including diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction and risk stratification of patients with non-ST-segment elevation acute coronary syndromes.
